name: burn-heal
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Cures a burn.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A spray-type medicine for treating burns. It can be used once to heal a Pokémon suffering from a burn.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A spray-type medicine for treating burns. It can be used once to heal a Pokémon suffering from a burn.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A spray-type medicine for treating burns. It can be used to heal a single Pokémon suffering from a burn.
